text: See how Ultimate's amazing customers are finding innovative ways to put people first amidst the COVID-19 pandemic. https://ulti.pro/3fmLj63

How will Canada's economy and labour market emerge from the COVID-19 shutdown? Join us for a live webcast on May 26 at 2pm ET to learn more about Canada's most crucial impending challenges https://ulti.pro/3bYJ5aM

In recent months, we've heard from amazing speakers and experts who have shared their insights on the COVID-19 pandemic. If you've missed any or would like to watch them again, we invite you to check out our on-demand library: https://ulti.pro/2KP3VxA

People need access to accurate information in a language they understand, especially during this pandemic. @TranslatorsWB aims to close the language gaps that hinder critical humanitarian efforts worldwide. Learn how you can help at https://translatorswithoutborders.org/ #NationalVolunteerWeek

How can we all keep a positive outlook, despite the challenges we’re currently facing? Join us for a live webcast with Simon Sinek as he discusses ways to create an environment of trust and safety in an ever-changing world, to ultimately emerge stronger. https://ulti.pro/2Rk7AXM

Effective April 1, The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA) will potentially impact millions across the country. What does this mean for you, your family, employees, and company? Learn more in our LIVE webcast, Friday April 10th at 1pm EST. https://ulti.pro/2xaXktU
We are #InspiredByPeople like UltiPeep Andie Heffernan who is making masks to help healthcare workers in her community amid shortages. Kudos to Andie and all those who are stepping up to help others!

The COVID-19 pandemic has impacted millions of people and businesses worldwide. Learn how HR/Payroll solutions can help during difficult times in our webcast tomorrow, April 3rd at 1pm EST featuring @beneubanks. https://ulti.pro/39C2Frm

Join CHROs and business leaders for a live panel on how they are handling COVID-19, how they are communicating to employees during this time, how their business is responding, and what has been working well. Register now for tomorrow's event at 1 pm ET. https://ulti.pro/3bmRQe7

With cases of COVID-19 on the rise and news evolving daily in Canada, we know everyone wants to understand their rights and obligations during this time. Join us Friday, March 27th at 2pm EST to get your HR questions on COVID-19 answered. https://ulti.pro/33HgKTn

The safety and security of your employees, community and business is vital. Visit our COVID-19 leadership resource center for helpful research, tools, and best practices in uncertain times. https://ulti.pro/33w32SV

Many working parents are working triple-duty as full-time employees, caregivers, and educators. Here are some tips and resources to help you work from home — with kids. Please comment with your top tip so that we can all succeed together.
Join us for a free webcast on Friday March 20th at 1pm EST, with leading US employment lawyers to answer your HR questions related to COVID-19: https://ulti.pro/2w61gvO

With growing concern over how personal information is stored, maintaining people’s trust by safeguarding their private data is a pivotal. To celebrate #DataPrivacyDay we wanted to share with you the NEW UltiPro Privacy Manager tool! https://ulti.pro/36Cnlig #PrivacyAwarenessDay
